title: I'm gonna miss this when Riot kills, er, reworks Singed

embed.description: upload webm files. share webm files. webm hosting. convert gif to webm

body: never gets old no matter what elo it is.

replies.body: Then you probably aren't going to be missing it for quite a while since he has remained pretty much in exactly the same state both as a champion and in terms of game health for the games entire life soI highly doubt they would even bother reworking him.  Certainly not until they rework much bigger problems and that won't be done for a few years.
